accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

did.unittitle: Item 1: Resolution Commemorating the 100th Anniversary of the Triangle Shirtwaist Factory Fire

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Proposed by District 4 Councilman, Jesse Arreguin, to the Mayor and City Council of New York City.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Celebrate the 100th Anniversary of International Women's Day; Learn About Women's Activism in Today's Latin America; BCC Remembers: 100th Anniversary of the Triangle Shirtwaist Fire and Immigrant Women Workers; Take Charge of Your Health

did.unittitle: Item 3: Join Berkeley City College for World Women's Month Activities
Item 4: Berkeley City College Remembers the Triangle Shirtwaist Fire and Immigrant Women Workers
